caption.p:
Maps to show spatial trends in annual mean grassland NPP values across the TRHR between 1988 and 2012. ( A) The statistical significance of trends. Note that NPP data for 2000 and 2012 for the TRHR were obtained from Xu
35 ; these data were generated using the global production efficiency model incorporated at a localized level. ( B) Inter-annual variability in grassland NPP between 1988 and 2012. These maps were created using the software ArcMap 10.2.2 ( http://www.esri.com/software/arcgis/arcgis-for-desktop)
92 .
